# Node Graph Editor

A canvas-based node graph editor built with Vite and TypeScript.

## Features
- Canvas-based node visualization
- Drag and drop nodes
- Connect nodes with various relationship types (equals, greater, less, etc.)
- Save/load state from localStorage
- Clear localStorage functionality

## Development
- Run `npm install` to install dependencies
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Run `npm run build` to build for production
